page.title: 13GAMES AT FAIR OAK SCHOOL
page.content: As well as netball, football and rounders we have some special games{ { Instant Cricket}is played with a small wooden bat, a waste paper bin and a rounders post. The basket is the wicket and you have to run to the post and back to score a run. The bowler throws the ball and tries to get the ball in the basket. If he hits the basket you are out; if he gets the ball in the basket three times the whole side is out and you change round. Only the bowler can hit the wicket. {Padder Tennis.}This is like ordinary tennis except that the court is smaller, the net is lower and the bats are like big table tennis bats. { Potted Sports.}We have all kinds of activities set up-running,jumping, balancing,throwing etc. Everyone does as many as they can in a set time.
